alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 10:24PM MST until March 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts. Snow will be showery in nature and accumulations will be highly variable. Some areas in the advisory area will see little to no snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in places. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions which may impact the evening and morning commutes and reduced visibility in the heavier showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley
